text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
All right! Time for a one-on-one with<n>the sea! Catch ya later,
Teach!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With summer camp in full swing,<n>Hishi Amazon wastes no
time in<n>diving into the sparkling blue waters.<n>However...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Hours later, she still hasn't returned.<n>The sky begins to turn
bright red in the<n>glow of the setting sun, when finally...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff... I'm back, Teach! Ittook a while, but I did it!
choice_data_list: I was getting worried. What happened?
I was getting worried. What happened?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I got caught in the outgoing tide while<n>I was swimming, and
it swept me out<n>to sea.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I could've easily swum back by<n>moving out of the current,
but this was<n>a challenge from the ocean to me,<n>y'know?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
So I faced it head-on! I swam against<n>the current and made
it all the way<n>back by sheer grit! Hah, rip currents<n>ain't got
nothin' on me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The phrase, "Don't try this at home,<n>folks," unwittingly pops
into my mind.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, I worked up another good<n>sweat today. Let's get
going, Teach.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Just as we're about to leave the<n>beach...

text_block_list.name: Local Resident
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, what a pickle. We're really<n>getting down to the wire
here. I've got<n>to figure something out...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Huh, sounds like that guy's in a jam.<n>Must be one of the
locals. Hey, you<n>there. Something wrong?

text_block_list.name: Local Resident
text_block_list.text:
Ah... Well, you see, we're supposed<n>to be holding a
karaoke contest at the<n>summer festival this evening.

text_block_list.name: Local Resident
text_block_list.text:
But as it stands now, we simply<n>don't have enough
participants. I<n>guess everyone's too embarrassed<n>to do
karaoke out in the open...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Ooh, yeah, that sounds like trouble.<n>And I can't ignore a
person in trouble.<n>But as much as I'd like to help...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
There's probably no point trying to<n>invite people if they're
all too shy to<n>begin with. You got any bright ideas,<n>Teach?
choice_data_list: How about asking the other camp members?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, nice one! There'll be plenty of<n>competition if we all join
in together. I<n>get it!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
That was some quick thinking, Teach.<n>An Umamusume
karaoke contest!<n>Just the idea is gettin' me all fired up!

text_block_list.name: Entry No. 6
text_block_list.text: Thank you all for cheering me on!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The karaoke contest comes alive with<n>the passionate
singing and dancing of<n>the Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Not too shabby. Well, just keep thestage warm for me. I'm gonna bethe one to take the crown.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Course I do. After all, I've got thesepowerful pipes that you helpedme perfect!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
On an outdoor stage, the sky's my<n>only limit. Who could
possibly take me<n>down? As long as nobody busts out<n>
with some secret weapon...

text_block_list.name: Entry No. 7
text_block_list.text:
Hello, I'm entry number seven! I'll be<n>performing a duet
with Kenta, a<n>student at the local junior high. Hope<n>you
enjoy this special collaboration!

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: Ooh!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Wh-what? A duet?! Didn't see that<n>one coming...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
And the audience is just eatin' it up!<n>You gotta be kidding
me...

text_block_list.name: Entry No. 7
text_block_list.text: Thank you, thank you! Let's see<n>what we scored...

text_block_list.name: Entry No. 7
text_block_list.text: Yay! Ninety-eight points!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Ninety-eight?! Th-th-that's crazy.There's no way I can top a duet witha local if I just stick to my usualroutine.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
So what now? This ain't just about<n>skill anymore. I gotta
come up with a<n>game plan...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Actually, wait. I'm the absolute worst<n>at hashin' out strats...
Anything pop<n>into your mind, Teach?
choice_data_list: You know what they say—an eye for an eye!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Whaddya mean? An eye for an eye?<n>So, like, a tooth for a
tooth... A duet for<n>a duet...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, so that's what you're gettin' at!<n>If I sing a duet too,
then that levels the<n>playing field. Now I just gotta find the<n>
right partner!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, it'd make sense to team up<n>with another
Umamusume since<n>concerts are kinda our thing...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
But I'm gonna mix things up and go<n>with my gut! My duet
partner is gonna<n>be... you, Teach!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
That's right. I mean, sure, us Umas<n>sing all the time, so we
might have a<n>slight edge...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: But you're pairing up with mehere! We have something specialbetween us that goes beyond comprehension.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Come on, remember our cook-off?<n>The two of us went
pedal to the metal<n>making totally different kinds of grub.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
That's the feeling I'm gunning for.<n>We were dishing it out
left and right,<n>but it was like we were still a team.<n>That kind
of feeling.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: I want a one-on-one—in duet form!Where we can tussle and tangle insong and really heat things up!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
You're the only one who could<n>possibly keep up with me.
So<n>whaddya say? Let's sing my<n>song—together!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Haha, I knew you'd come around!<n>With you on board, this
contest's as<n>good as won!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Let's go, partner!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Ladies and gents—it's time for the<n>main event! A tag-team
performance<n>is great and all, but how 'bout a<n>sizzling hot
session for that whole<n>summer vibe?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Here comes a special duel—er,duet—from ol' Teach here andyours truly! Play that music loud andproud!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
A toast to our epic win—cheers! Haha,<n>I had no idea you
could sing like that,<n>Teach!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
We fought tooth and nail, and stole<n>that sweet summer
spotlight! Guess<n>our burning passion gave us the<n>edge.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Heh. Please, what're you on about?<n>Keep spouting crap like
that, and I'll<n>put ya in a headlock.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
In the end, we couldn't match each<n>other—just like always.
So we both<n>started doing our own thing, and it<n>turned out
great.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
That's the path we finally found. One<n>that belongs to us, and
us alone.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
So don't pull your punches, Teach.<n>Keep comin' at me.
We'll keep<n>serving up those<n>one-on-ones—together!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
We'll lock horns, duke it out, and then<n>laugh when we win
after charging in<n>guns blazing. So whaddya say? Want<n>a
piece of that action?
choice_data_list: As many pieces as I can get.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Teach...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Wait, what's with that wording? Ithink maybe you're getting a littletoo into this. But, well...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Heh. All right—it's a promise! This<n>victory is only the
beginning!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I won't lose to you, so don't you<n>dare lose to me! We're
gonna keep<n>this one-on-one rollin'! I'll be running<n>at full
speed—just try to leave me in<n>the dust!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rather than lining up neatly, our<n>footprints continue to
intertwine like<n>they're competing. Maybe this is<n>what a
three-legged race really looks<n>like?
